DS Shared Blocks Documentation

Shared Blocks For Reuse Across Different Themes

  • Last Updated: May 6, 2014
  • Themed By: DesignsSquare.com
  • Email: contact@designssquare.com

?About

Whats included?

The site contains designssquare.com.blog, designssquare.com.slider and designssquare.com.theme.builder artifacts besides the Loam specific functionality extracted into module designssquare.com.site.loam

Overall

coming soon...

?Installation

How To Install?

In the following are the steps to install Loam site

  1. Copy all modules into sites/all/modules folder
  2. Copy all themes into sites/all/themes folder
  3. Enable theme 'bootstrap' and set theme 'builder' as default
  4. Enable module DesignsSquare Blog Widget(designssquare_com_blog)
  5. Enable module DesignsSquare Slider Widget(designssquare_com_slider) and sub module 'DesignsSquare Rev Slider'
  6. Enable module DesignsSquare.com: Site: Loam
  7. Enable module DesignsSquare.com: Site: Loam: Data
  8. Enable module 'DesignsSquare.com: Site: Loam: Footer Menu' and 'DesignsSquare.com: Site: Loam: Main Menu' to import main and footer menus
  9. Revert any features in OVERRIDE state and clear all cache

Override Templates

Each block has the template file. By adding template file with the exact name in the themes folder, it will override the origin block template file. If you like to override template file in Custome module than use hook_NAME_OF_THE_TEMPLATE_FILE_alter() as folowing

function MODULE-NAME_block__ds_announcement_alter(&$path_to_template){ $path_to_template = drupal_get_path('module', 'designssquare_com_site_church').'/templates'; }

Here, the template named - 'block__ds_announcement' for block 'Annoucement' is overriden

About Block Plus

Block Plus flows into templates two access points - block_api and context. The 'context' can be modified via hook_ds_block_context() as following:

function designssquare_com_site_church_ds_block_context_alter(&$context, $block_id){ switch($block_id){ case 'ds_social': $context['classes_array'][] = 'col-sm-3'; $context['classes_array'][] = 'row-element'; break; case 'ds_about': $context['classes_array'][] = 'par-macitaju'; break; } } Here, the blocks ds_social and ds_about context is altered with classes to be added

About Regions

There are two new regions - 'Page Top Bar' and 'User Popover'. The 'Page Top Bar' is an area on right of the page title used for search block but can be for any other block.

The 'User Popover' is the region that opens open when clicked on the user name on the right side of the Theme header. A typical usage for this region is to assign User Menu

Dependent Modules

  • menu_html : to allow html in menu items
  • context : to reuse blocks such as search block,etc

Troubleshooting

1. Menu item shows up in html tags
Make sure you have set 'Allow html' for the particular menu element that can be done either at the Page Options or Menu/Edit Menu Item

2. Menu item is not dropping down
Make sure the menu item with sub menu is set to 'Show as expanded' in the Menu configurations

3. Cannot Revert Designssquare_com_theme_cascade_structure module Make sure the Themes - Bootstrap and Cascade is enabled. There are variables in the Designssquare_com_theme_cascade_structure module that require both Themes enabled in order revert
